subject: Steroids
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: When Alex Rodriguez meets with M.L.B. officials on Sunday, they will want to know who provided him with performance-enhancing drugs and whether that person had access to major league clubhouses.
snippet: When Alex Rodriguez meets with M.L.B. officials on Sunday, they will want to know who provided him with performance-enhancing drugs and whether that person had access to major league clubhouses.
